doc.previous: The Republic lies in 42nd place out of 55 in a list of the most forested countries in Europe 126 Much of the land is now covered with pasture and there are many species of wild flower Gorse Ulex europaeus a wild furze is commonly found growing in the uplands and ferns are plentiful in the more moist regions especially in the western parts It is home to hundreds of plant species some of them unique to the island and has been invaded by some grasses such as Spartina anglica 127
doc.after: The algal and seaweed flora is that of the cold temperate variety The total number of species is 574 128 and is distributed as follows
